attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this petition to stop Newcastle City Council as (reported in the Newcastle Evening Chronicle)
From buying up land and properties in Newcastle and surrounding area.
If they have surplus money it should be spent on road improvement or traffic calming measures.
If this money is coming out of Council tax then it is a disgrace and should not be used for gambling in the property market.
Give it back to the tax payers who are struggling to pay their mortgages and reduce the tax in future.
It is just like the Banks gambling with our money on the Stock Market and look where that got us.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
